name: todo-app
description: Full-stack todo application with Node.js, Express, React, and Redux Toolkit

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build-all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: npm run build-all && concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run preview"
